sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../styles/Page.css"; export default function Terms() { return (

Terms & Conditions

Welcome to Guide Nepal. These Terms & Conditions (“Terms”) govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using Guide Nepal, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part, please do not use our services.

1. Use of Service

Guide Nepal grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the service in accordance with these Terms. You may not use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.

2. Account Registration

To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for safeguarding your password and any activity under your account.

3. Vendor Accounts

Vendors must apply for an account and be approved by our admin. You agree to comply with all vendor guidelines and to only post accurate information about your services.

4. Content Ownership

All content on Guide Nepal (text, images, logos) is owned by Guide Nepal or licensed to us. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our prior written consent.

5. User-Generated Content

You retain ownership of content you submit (reviews, itineraries). By submitting, you grant us a worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute it.

6. Prohibited Conduct

  • No harassment, hate speech, or defamation.
  • No spamming, phishing, or fraudulent activities.
  • No infringement of intellectual property rights.

7. Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violation of these Terms or for any reason at our sole discretion.

8. Disclaimers & Limitation of Liability

Guide Nepal is provided “as is” without warranties. We are not responsible for third-party content, and our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

9. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms. We’ll post changes here, and your continued use constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

Last updated: April 2025

); }
